title: Early Morning Shooting Was Accidental, Self-Inflicted
content:
Lexington police have concluded their investigation into an early morning shooting after they learned that the shooting was accidentally self-inflicted.
Officers responded to the area of South Broadway and Cedar Street, about a block from the Tolly-Ho Restaurant, around 3:30 a.m. Police say the victim was about 17-years-old and suffered a gunshot wound to the leg.
EMS took the victim to UK Hospital.
Officers say they had a difficult time piecing together exactly what happened because the victim was not particularly cooperative and told different officers conflicting stories. Eventually they determined that the victim accidentally shot himself.
